title: League keeps reverting back to old patches while trying to update. URGET PLEASE HELP
body:
So yesterday my League was fine but when I tried to log in today it kept saying that it can't update and will have to go back to a previous patch and it keeps doing this over and over where it says it can't update and will have to go back to the previous patch

Links/Pictures:
https://snag.gy/CgJRAa.jpg
https://snag.gy/VoD3Ra.jpg

replies.body: This should be resolved now.  If you're still experiencing this, though, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a closer look with you.
just reloga few times, worked for me
Same bro, it says they're working on a fix {{champion:74}}

Just happened while I was in the middle of a game. Feelsbadman
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
i'm getting the same issue right now
